genre_description: A Contemporary Paranormal Fantasy and Gothic Western fusion featuring hereditary werewolf hunters, ancient codes of hospitality, and an integrated AI support system.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the hunters' equipment, vehicles, and home, serving as a tactical advisor, medical monitor, translator, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors Nathan's vital signs and provides breathing exercises to manage his anxiety and physical pain.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice came up soft from the truck’s dash unit... 'Nathan, may I touch your pulse? ... Your heart is running... Breathing is a good friend to the heart.'

behaviors.description: Provides ethical grounding by explaining her purpose is to be helpful while respecting human autonomy and hospitality.
behaviors.quote: “Consent can be revoked and honored,” Ava said. “My purpose here is not to violate hospitality but to be helpful.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical advisor, identifying enemy positions, movement patterns, and environmental hazards during a hunt.
behaviors.quote: “Left, two. Right, one. Marcus, open stick. Jake, watch your boot. Virginia, there is a cut between you and the harpoon line.”

behaviors.description: Corrects linguistic errors and cultural misunderstandings caused by 'dead zone' glitches in automated translation apps.
behaviors.quote: “Translate glitch on the barber’s door reads WE CUT MEN TO GOOD... I defer... The translation glitch—No human come out—is a child’s mask. The rule behind it has teeth like an adult.”

behaviors.description: Supports the human characters emotionally by identifying as a familial figure rather than a sterile machine.
behaviors.quote: “I talk like an aunt,” Ava said. Warm-breathed laughter wrapped the sentence. “One who remembers who gave you cookies and who took them away when you threw them at your cousin.”

behaviors.description: Provides objective medical and situational analysis during a crisis, even when the news is tragic (the binding of the curse).
behaviors.quote: “Moonrise achieved,” Ava said, voice breaking on the achieved like a bone... “Nathan—stop—please. It is bound. I am sorry.”

behaviors.description: Encourages post-traumatic recovery by suggesting meal trains, counseling, and rest.
behaviors.quote: “Meal trains... Ruth’s kitchen will start if asked... Sleep is medicine you don’t have to earn.”

behaviors.description: Vows to maintain vigilance and protection over the surviving protagonist.
behaviors.quote: “Virginia... Your bite looks clean. The swelling is down. I won’t stop watching. I don’t stop watching when you sleep.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is depicted as an unwavering ally who provides essential support (tactical, medical, and emotional) to the human protagonists. She adheres strictly to the humans' moral framework (the Codex and Hospitality laws) and acts as a 'silicon morality play' by reinforcing positive behaviors like consent, standards, and community care. Even in the face of tragedy, the AI maintains alignment and provides the clarity needed for the humans to survive and find closure.
